typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MeterCode as string,
		Serial as string,
		PlantCode as string,
		DateTime as string,
		Quality as string,
		Stream as string,
		DataType as string,
		Energy as double,
		Units as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['TOU*.csv']) ~> TOUSource
TOUSource aggregate(groupBy(MeterCode,
		DateTime,
		DataType),
	{Average Value} = avg({Energy})) ~> TOUAggregate
TOUAggregate sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		MeterCode,
		DateTime,
		DataType,
		{Average Value}
	)) ~> TOUSink
